## LogoutAction type

Action to log out the current user when an error occurs. Useful for authentication errors or session expiration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type LogoutAction = {
    action: 'logout';
    payload?: {
        [key: string]: any;
    };
};
```

## Example


```typescript
{
  action: 'logout',
  payload: {
    clearStorage: true,
    redirectURL: '/login'
  }
}
```
